thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Enea Evaluates The Possibility To Issue A Senior Unsecured Bond Of SEK 500 mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Enea Evaluates The Possibility To Issue A Senior Unsecured Bond Of SEK 500 mln
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - ENEA AB:
* ENEA EVALUATES POTENTIAL ACQUISITION AND THE POSSIBILITY TO ISSUE A SENIOR UNSECURED BOND OF SEK 500M
* ‍SIGNED A LETTER OF INTENT TO ACQUIRE A US-BASED COMPANY FOCUSED ON MOBILE TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT SOLUTIONS​
* ‍ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE SIGNED IN NEAR FUTURE AND COMPLETED DURING APRIL 2018​
* TOTAL PURCHASE PRICE CONSIDERATION WILL AMOUNT TO APPROXIMATELY USD 90M
* IS LOOKING TO RAISE SEK 500M IN A SENIOR UNSECURED BOND LOAN WITH A TENOR OF 3 YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
